snippet: On their new album, “Folila,” Amadou & Mariam are joined by an all-star cast of indie musicians.
abstract: Folila album from blind husband-and-wife duo Amadou and Mariam was originally conceived as two albums, and features an all-star cast of indie musicians and traditional instrumentalists from Mali; couple hopes to expand their audience in the United States, where their mix of pop and blues-rock has been slower to catch on than in Europe.
lead_paragraph: On their new album, “Folila,” Amadou & Mariam are joined by an all-star cast of indie musicians.

headline.seo: Amadou & Mariam Aim to Expand Audience With ‘Folila’
headline.main: Ringing Voice and Guitar Echo Globally
headline.print_headline: Ringing Voice And Guitar Echo Globally
